attributes.value: Dislikes cooperation
Finds the ideas of independence and freedom somewhat foolish
Believes it is important to conceal emotions and refrain from complaining
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Holds craftsmanship to be of the highest ideals and celebrates talented artisans and their masterworks
Respects the development of skill
Is not the type to fall in love or even develop positive feelings
Is dour as a rule
Doesn't stick with things if even minor difficulties arise
Is grateful when others help her out and tries to return favors
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Forms only fleeting and rare emotional bonds with others
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Can sometimes act without deliberation
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Dislikes abstract discussions and would much rather focus on practical examples
Extremely quick to tire
Rarely sick
A way with words
A feel for music
